title: Global stocks rebound as trade fears ease
text:
Global stocks rebound as trade fears ease 5:39pm IST - 01:52 
World stocks came off six-week lows and U.S. stock futures jumped on optimism that the United States and China are set to begin negotiations on trade, easing fears about a trade war between the world's two largest economies. As Kate King reports, the U.S. and South Korea have also agreed to revise a trade pact with U.S. automakers winning improved market access and Korean steelmakers hit with quotas but avoiding hefty tariffs.
